Phase209Description:
The Druid Ardreth of Tur Dulra has asked for aid in finding the ancient spirit Gathlen before the lesser spirits of the perish. 

The tormented spirit of Gathlen has been imprisoned. I must find a way to set the spirit free.
Callback217Header: Honor Gathlen and mount the Skull of the Stag Lord on the Altar
Name: Druid: Spirits of the Lost Grove
Phase113Description: The Druids of Tur Dulra have much to teach. I should travel there and learn of the powers they possess.
Phase97Description:
The Druid Ardreth of Tur Dulra has asked for aid in finding the ancient spirit Gathlen before the lesser spirits of the perish. 

I have recovered Gathlen's skull. I should return to Tur Dulra and speak with Ardreth.
Callback96Header: Speak with Druid Ardreth in Tur Dulra
Phase101Description:
The Druid Ardreth of Tur Dulra has asked for aid in finding the ancient spirit Gathlen before the lesser spirits of the perish. 

The tormented spirit of Gathlen has been imprisoned. I must find a way to set the spirit free.
Callback208Header: Pick up the Skull of the Spirit Lord
Phase204Description:
The Druid Ardreth of Tur Dulra has asked for aid in finding the ancient spirit Gathlen before the lesser spirits of the perish. 

I must honor Gathlen by placing his skull on the shrine.
Callback115Header: Speak with Druid Ardreth in Tur Dulra
Phase182Description:
The Druid Ardreth of Tur Dulra has asked for aid in finding the ancient spirit Gathlen before the lesser spirits of the perish. 

I should visit the shrine to Gathlen and pay homage there.
Callback181Header: Travel to the Shrine of the Spirit Lord
Phase189Description:
The Druid Ardreth of Tur Dulra has asked for aid in finding the ancient spirit Gathlen before the lesser spirits of the perish. 

I must speak with the tormented spirit of Gathlen.
